com.brightcove.vmap

Class VideoAdPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • android.widget.VideoView
          • com.brightcove.vmap.VideoAdPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl

    @Emits(events={"videoAdCompleted","videoAdLearnMore","videoAdPlaybackError","videoAdProgress","videoAdSkip","videoAdStarted"})
public class VideoAdPlayer
extends android.widget.VideoView
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener
    VideoView used to play video ads.
